name: Windows Single Sign On Credential Collector (Mimikatz)
author: Ben Campbell <eat_meatballs@hotmail.co.uk>
description:
This module will collect cleartext Single Sign On credentials from the Local
      Security Authority using the Mimikatz extension. Blank passwords will not be stored
      in the database.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
